main_definition: Alfred is a proper noun, typically referring to Alfred the Great or other notable individuals named Alfred.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A nickname for Alfred J. Osborn (1927-2018), American actor
meanings_and_examples.example: Alfred played a key role in the movie 'The Outsider'.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An abbreviation of Alfred, used informally as part of names or pseudonyms
meanings_and_examples.example: John and Jane decided to name their newborn son Alfie after this term.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A variant spelling of the given name 'Alfred', often found in older texts or literature
meanings_and_examples.example: 'Sir Alfred' was a renowned knight during his time.
